# UpdateApiVersionRequest

Information about the API version.

**Properties**

| Name         | Type   | Required | Description                                     |
| :----------- | :----- | :------- | :---------------------------------------------- |
| name         | string | ✅       | The version's name.                             |
| releaseNotes | string | ❌       | The version's Markdown-supported release notes. |
